channel.title: Comments on: Famous World of Warcraft

item.title: By: Bella
item.dc:creator: Bella
item.description: I have got to admit i laughed so hard reading this all the way to the bottom, it is true Females do tend to play casters and have melee/dps alts. I myself have a main priest and an alt hunter. It may be a general stereotype but its still hilarious. I know a few girls who dps's but very few who tank. As for celebrities, its nice and all but they wouldn't have the time to play it like we all do anyways so meh. I was merely out to prove a point to my sister that the game is more popular than she thinks it is, case closed really lol.
item.content:encoded: I have got to admit i laughed so hard reading this all the way to the bottom, it is true Females do tend to play casters and have melee/dps alts. I myself have a main priest and an alt hunter. It may be a general stereotype but its still hilarious. I know a few girls who dps’s but very few who tank. As for celebrities, its nice and all but they wouldn’t have the time to play it like we all do anyways so meh. I was merely out to prove a point to my sister that the game is more popular than she thinks it is, case closed really lol.

item.title: By: Sophie

item.description: Matt Good from FFTL has a night elf hunter on Lightning's Blade.
item.content:encoded: Matt Good from FFTL has a night elf hunter on Lightning’s Blade.

item.title: By: Lolz
item.dc:creator: Lolz
item.description: I know Johnny Depp plays WoW. After all, he is my neighbor. US(Turalyon) Orc DK, Scissorhands.
item.content:encoded:
I know Johnny Depp plays WoW. After all, he is my neighbor.

item.title: By: Ha
item.dc:creator: Ha
item.description: Lol@All the girls who post here and try to make their comments about themselves and how "hot" they are.
item.content:encoded: Lol@All the girls who post here and try to make their comments about themselves and how “hot” they are.

item.title: By: Alana
item.dc:creator: Alana
item.description: I'm a chick and I love WoW, but i wouldn't dream of rolling a caster. My main is a feral druid. Love my kitty! My bf and I were at his friend's house for a group sesh of Warcraft playing and this guy asked why there aren't more hot nerd girls like me. Haha.
item.content:encoded:
I’m a chick and I love WoW, but i wouldn’t dream of rolling a caster. My main is a feral druid. Love my kitty!
My bf and I were at his friend’s house for a group sesh of Warcraft playing and this guy asked why there aren’t more hot nerd girls like me. Haha.

item.title: By: Zaranna
item.dc:creator: Zaranna
item.description: Theres a magazine called Online Gamer and it had an Interview with the Lead Singer from " Blue Oyster Cult " who religiously plays WOW and other online games. He plays also when ther on Tour. I have the magazine, but I forgot his character names, guild and server, it does mention it though.
item.content:encoded: Theres a magazine called Online Gamer and it had an Interview with the Lead Singer from ” Blue Oyster Cult ” who religiously plays WOW and other online games. He plays also when ther on Tour. I have the magazine, but I forgot his character names, guild and server, it does mention it though.

item.title: By: Jess
item.dc:creator: Jess
item.content:encoded:
Regarding women that play:

I know at least 12 women that are attractive that play with their husbands, boyfriends, girlfriends, or solo. You don’t have to be ugly or beautiful to cast innervate at the right time or cast FFB. Odd generalization though, most of the women I know, play casters ðŸ˜›

That’s funny, I happen to play with my Husband, and I play a Resto Druid. I know several other gamer girls, and at least three other married couples that play WoW. I do believe all of the women/girls I know play casters. Although some of them have melee/ranged alts, their mains are indeed casters…
